about.long-text1-first: Some may view emotion as the unwanted sibling of logic, sometimes heavily burdening us with fear and sorrow. However, emotion serves a distinct purpose of its own. Alongside with its ability to give pleasure, it has evolutionarily developed to act as an alarm, an instant signal to let us be aware of any potential danger or threat.
about.long-text1-second: As the logical brain is important for solving complicated problems through meticulous thinking, the emotional brain is also crucial, since it discretely dictates our actions and thoughts behind the logical brain. Thus, the functionality of the brain, in other words Cognitive Force, should be understood as a result of the concordance of the two brains and their ability to cooperate effectively.
about.long-text2-first: We learn how to grow and control our logical brain in a systematic way; through mathematics, science, economics and so on.
about.long-text2-second: But where do we learn to train our emotional brain? Furthermore, where do we learn to integrate logic and emotion?
about.long-text2-third: We see the potent increase of psychological problems as a result of this soaring discrepancy between these two brains, as we disregarded emotion over the sake of logic.
about.long-text2-fourth: That is where HEARTH rises to the occasion, to help us refine the emotional brain and ultimately coexist with the logical brain in harmony.
about.rest-text-first: It is here to understand our emotions through self-analyzation, by finding out what each of our distinct cognitive abilities are, from strength to weakness. It is here to cultivate emotional depth, and enhance its interconnectivity with logic by practicing our cognitive functions in a personalized, yet collective way. Here we focus on 6 intertwined yet individual set of Cognitive Force, which as a sum is
about.rest-text-second: “HEARTH”: Helm, Envisage, Attune, Reverie, Transcend, and Harmonize.
about.rest-text-third: Focus on controlling and enhancing these 6 aspects and we will shine bright, by becoming the best version of ourselves.
about.rest-text-fourth: HEARTH, we are here to help us.

apps.helm: HELM is the Cognitive Force that allows one to lead a meaningful life and develop a character of depth. It is a path that must be cultivated in order to reach self-actualization and fulfill the calling given to each and every one, covering the full spectrum from the archetypal to the idiosyncratic. Introspection, Integration, and Individuation are the three key components of this Emerald Flame.
apps.helm_intro: HELM is the Cognitive Force that allows one to lead a meaningful life and develop a character of depth. It is a path that must be cultivated in order to reach self-actualization and fulfill the calling given to each and every one, covering the full spectrum from the archetypal to the idiosyncratic.
apps.helm_are: are the three key components of this
apps.envisage: ENVISAGE is the Cognitive Force that engenders deep insight and permits one to intuitively fathom the true nature of things. It is the art of abstract thinking and theorization, which shines through in complex decision-making processes that necessitate both analytic and holistic cognition. Reflection, Systemization, and Sagacity are the three key components of this Cobalt Flame.
apps.envisage_intro: ENVISAGE is the Cognitive Force that engenders deep insight and permits one to intuitively fathom the true nature of things. It is the art of abstract thinking and theorization, which shines through in complex decision-making processes that necessitate both analytic and holistic cognition.

apps.attune: ATTUNE is the Cognitive Force that modifies and maneuvers with great precision and pertinence, facilitating one to cleverly advance in the face of adversity. It is the tactical acumen and wits of a diplomat, which is essential for navigating through predicaments while maintaining balance and integrity. Perceptivity, Plasticity, and Optimization are the three key components of this Cyan Flame.

It is the tactical acumen and wits of a diplomat, which is essential for navigating through predicaments while maintaining balance and integrity.

apps.reverie: REVERIE is the Cognitive Force that endows novelty and vivacity, blessing one’s mind with beauty and freedom of thought. It is the gift of vivid imagination and innovative creativity, which through playful roaming or cathartic brooding, kindles major breakthroughs and paradigm shifts. Curiosity, Originality, and Artistry are the three key components of this Canary Flame.
apps.reverie_intro: REVERIE is the Cognitive Force that endows novelty and vivacity, blessing one’s mind with beauty and freedom of thought. It is the gift of vivid imagination and innovative creativity, which through playful roaming or cathartic brooding, kindles major breakthroughs and paradigm shifts.

apps.transcend: TRANSCEND is the Cognitive Force that conquers and expands through courage and determination, enabling one to confront and march above one’s own fear and pain. It is the mindset of a warrior, which must be harnessed as a means to exceed preconceived limitations, and perform valiantly under pressure. Passion, Resilience, and Ascendency are the three key components of this Crimson Flame.
apps.transcend_intro: TRANSCEND is the Cognitive Force that conquers and expands through courage and determination, enabling one to confront and march above one’s own fear and pain. It is the mindset of a warrior, which must be harnessed as a means to exceed preconceived limitations, and perform valiantly under pressure.

apps.harmonize: HARMONIZE is the Cognitive Force that enriches one’s journey with true companions and mutual cooperative alliance. It is the ability to graciously synergize through genuine bonding, creating positive relationships with others regardless of their personality or background. Sensibility, Eloquence, and Resonance are the three key components of this Magenta Flame.

team.line1: Team HEARTH was created to accomplish the mission of elevating mental wellness of humanity via offering a personalized help structure.
team.line2: As we recognize that health encompasses not only the body, but also the mind and soul,
team.line3: we are here to ensure the holistic development of the triad by uplifting the latter.
team.line4: Our vision is to help everyone in need through fostering depth, strength, and beauty by the means of creative and sustainable methods.
team.line5: “There will always be rocks in the road ahead of us. They will be stumbling blocks or stepping stones; it all depends on how you use them.”
team.line6: As you navigate through life, Team HEARTH wishes to accompany your journey and assist you along the way
team.line7: by providing philosophical and psychological insights. As we are here to help you, you can also help others by taking part in our mission.
team.line8: Join us in our community, participate in diverse programs, and help build a healthy community that will enlighten yourself and the world.
team.line9: For any inquiry, feel free to contact us on
team.p2_line1: Director, building and refining the overarching structure
team.p2_line2: of HEARTH, establishing a clear vision.
team.p2_line3: As a M.D. who is deeply engrossed in philosophy and psychology,
team.p2_line4: endeavors to foster a holistic healing process
team.p2_line5: and take part in the ennoblement of humanity.
team.p3_line1: Visualizer, directing the artistic and creative elements of projects.
team.p3_line2: Designer of User Interface and Experience,
team.p3_line3: driven to develop concepts and ideas into visual narratives,
team.p3_line4: crafting digital interactions into user-centric journeys.
team.p4_line1: Program creator and assessor, producing new materials
team.p4_line2: and improving content quality through philosophical contemplations.
team.p4_line3: Having background in both Psychology and Mechanical Engineering,
team.p4_line4: seeks to understand the underlying mechanics of human psychology,
team.p4_line5: and uncover the path to a more fulfilled life.
team.p5_line1: Operator, maintaining a panoramic view of projects
team.p5_line2: and orchestrating the workflow to keep all facets
team.p5_line4: With a background in Computer Science,
team.p5_line5: transforms the team’s concepts into tangible realities
team.p5_line6: while balancing our mission to be both innovative and resonant.

test.measure: This test is designed to measure your
test.within: the flame that burns within you.
test.before: Before taking the test, bring yourself to a calm state of mind to effectively assess and rediscover your true colors.
test.choose: Choose from five scales according to the degree of your personal affiliation to each sentence.

questions.question: Question
questions.q1: I analyze my own psychological state.
questions.q2: My beliefs, actions, and goals are unified to form an organized whole.
questions.q3: I am maturing into the individual I was meant to be.
questions.q4: I find pleasure in deep contemplation.
questions.q6: In the grand scheme of things, my life is proceeding as I envisioned.
questions.q7: I possess a keen sense of perception.
questions.q8: I can mold myself to adequately fit in diverse situations.
questions.q9: I make the most effective use of my given situation.
questions.q12: I express myself through creative outlets such as painting, music, and poetry.
questions.q14: I remain brave in the face of fear.
questions.q16: I can accurately sense the emotional state of others.
questions.q18: My words and actions are warm and evocative.
questions.q19: I enjoy having profound discussions about life and its meaning.
questions.q20: I am not worried about how others would view me.
questions.q21: I don’t feel the need to prove my worth.
questions.q22: I carefully consider my decisions before acting.
questions.q23: I am clearly focused on my goals and priorities.
questions.q24: I have a deep intuitive grasp of abstract ideas.
questions.q25: I make decisions based on hard evidence.
questions.q26: I can handle multiple responsibilities simultaneously.
questions.q28: I feel a strong urge to explore and discover.
questions.q29: I like to come up with new ideas.
questions.q30: I am surrounded by beauty and art.
questions.q31: I inspire others with my energy and zeal.
questions.q33: I believe I can change the trajectory of my fate with my own hands.
questions.q34: I am unbothered by negative attitudes.
questions.q35: I can deliver a convincing speech in front of a large audience.
questions.q36: I sense goodness in everyone I meet.
questions.q37: I am aware of my innate limitations.
questions.q38: I accept the dark side of myself without repression.
questions.q39: I am not afraid to oppose the prevailing view.
questions.q40: I discern the true nature behind others’ personas.
questions.q41: I monitor and regulate my thought process.
questions.q42: I am able to think clearly under pressure.
questions.q43: I can sense the subtlest of changes.
questions.q44: If something doesn’t go as planned, I can always improvise for the better.
questions.q45: I don’t waste my time and energy on what I cannot control.
questions.q46: I find myself questioning conventional beliefs.
questions.q47: I possess an idealized view of the world.
questions.q48: My life is both a tragedy and a comedy.
questions.q49: I do more than what is required of me.
questions.q50: No matter how many times I fail, I never give up.
questions.q51: I voluntarily embrace discomfort for the sake of growth.
questions.q52: I can read between the lines.
questions.q53: I am pleasantly tactful and well-mannered.
questions.q54: People deeply trust me and confide to me their darkest secrets.

firecopy.forceQuotient: Keep in mind that the result does not reflect your absolute value, but is rather a comparative assessment of yourself within your perspective of the world. For instance, low scores may indicate that you have a high expectation of yourself, while high scores indicate the opposite.
firecopy.copyResult: Would you like to get a copy of your results? Register now and start your journey with HEARTH.
firecopy.subscribeLetter: (Optional) Join the Hearthside and subscribe to our e-letter
firecopy.liveUp: Live Up to Your Fullest Potential
firecopy.personalize: Personalize your experience with your HEARTH Code

results.a-b: You possess the flame of Helm: a sincere and profound one that shines into your darkest corners. Casting its gentle light upon the subconscious realm, the fire illuminates your being in the deepest sense, enabling you to integrate your own shadow towards complete individuation. As an individual who follows one’s inner voice first and foremost, you journey through your life with character and uniqueness. Your goal would be to experience life in its fullest form, understand and connect with your deepest self, and transform yourself inasmuch as your own experience enlightens you. Perhaps, you also believe in determinism or fatalism in a poetic sense: whatever you do, given that you stay true to yourself, the decisions you make and their consequences will eventually lead you to the path that is destined to you. All in all, you are a humble student who strives to embrace the whole spectrum of life in solitude, not succumbing to businesslike mannerisms of half-hearted people. However, it is true that there is also wisdom, although a different kind, behind orderliness and professionalism that you might see as insincere or monotonous; depriving yourself of such rationality might risk your chance of survival in the long run. HEARTH is here to help: with Envisage, increase your capability to strategize by reflecting upon yourself, and eventually accept the wisdom to leading a secure and fulfilling life.
results.a-c: You possess the flame of Helm: a sincere and profound one that shines into your darkest corners. Casting its gentle light upon the subconscious realm, the fire illuminates your being in the deepest sense, enabling you to integrate your own shadow towards complete individuation. You are given the power to build your own self; against the endlessly crashing waves of existential fear and angst, you stand firm and dive into the abyss, slowly but steadily revealing one layer at a time. As you see yourself as a blank piece of paper ready to be painted and written down in any direction, you design your life as you see fit, carving and sculpting yourself until you reach the final form: the ideal person that you see in yourself. Although you might realize your own limitations, you strive to be deeper and more integrated, pushing yourself to the limit constantly, dissecting your wills and negotiating with them. In short, you are a shapeshifter, who is at times illogical and even comical, yet brilliant and amusing in the way you think and proceed in your life. Although your tendency to not confine yourself to any box may let you experience something that you would otherwise never have had the chance to, it also creates an unnecessary risk of being presumptuous and out of line, and may trap you in a wishful fantasy. HEARTH is here to help: with Attune, perceive yourself and the world with neutral clarity, mold your existence into an optimal form, and lead an ambitious, yet congruous life.
results.a-d: You possess the flame of Helm: a sincere and profound one that shines into your darkest corners. Casting its gentle light upon the subconscious realm, the fire illuminates your being in the deepest sense, enabling you to integrate your own shadow towards complete individuation. Possessing a stern and thoughtful mind, you lead a meaningful life of purpose, experiencing the world in a realistic and sensible way. Without giving into debauchery and immorality, you live a life which you regard as virtuous, keeping yourself in check from excessive fantasizing and hedonism. Furthermore, you have a rather deterministic standpoint regarding life: you would accept and follow the fate which is endowed to you, and despite the worries and doubts from time to time, rather than being discouraged from those hindrances, you would connect to your being in an even more profound manner. In short, you are a modest thinker of solitude who is deeply self-conscious, who leads an effective way of life without being pretentious or wishy-washy. However, as much as your candid simpleness is consistent and reliable when it comes to solving quintessential problems of life, you might be pressed of thinking outside the box; since there are complex and intricate matters which cannot be approached otherwise, it would be wise of you to learn how to view things from a creative angle. HEARTH is here to help: with Reverie, turn on your curious mind, build your original way of thinking, and learn how to apply artistry in everything to lead a more colorful life.
results.a-e: You possess the flame of Helm: a sincere and profound one that shines into your darkest corners. Casting its gentle light upon the subconscious realm, the fire illuminates your being in the deepest sense, enabling you to integrate your own shadow towards complete individuation. You are a moderate person who leads a quiet life of depth. Without indulging in narcissistic self-appraisal, you find your confidence in knowing who you truly are; you respect yourself in full scope despite your flaws, or perhaps more so because of them. Your tendency to be calm and collected aligns with humanitarian values, such as peace, good will, and brotherly love; you are likely to be interested in global welfare, if not participate in it. Furthermore, as you are humble and independent, you would be valued as a warm and restful advisor to your close friends and relatives. In short, you are an agreeable person of tranquility, who has a high understanding of oneself, joyfully abiding to your given fate rather than fighting for another. That being said, as your organic way of living lacks in the part of fierceness and passion, you could be underestimating your own potential, taking part in unchallenging roles while you can lead a more fulfilling life in a position of greater meaning. HEARTH is here to help: with Transcend, discover your true passion, grow resilient to failure, and lead a strong and forwarding life.
results.a-f: You possess the flame of Helm: a sincere and profound one that shines into your darkest corners. Casting its gentle light upon the subconscious realm, the fire illuminates your being in the deepest sense, enabling you to integrate your own shadow towards complete individuation. As a strong-willed person who holds life with a firm grip, you value being true to yourself more than anything else. Thus, it is likely that you find yourself quite different from the norm both in good and bad. Perhaps you would have spent time contemplating alone or enjoying art instead of participating in shallow interactions, which as a result, allows you to understand yourself and connect to your deepest parts, making possible for you to shine as a singular individual. Possessing a certain uniqueness in character, you are a person who people either love or feel distant to; some respect you for your sovereignty, while others deprecate your self-rule. In short, you are a person with a small yet strong social circle, who proceeds with true grit even at the loneliest times, all the while invigoratingly pursuing what you believe to be right. Although you might not feel the need to do so, you must know how to considerately negotiate with others and understand their ways of living, since not only does stepping outside of your circle provide foreign wisdom, but also cooperative force if your temporary objectives coincide. HEARTH is here to help: with Harmonize, unbolt your brotherly empathy, increase your coherence in interpersonal relationships, and lead a life of determination which also resonates with others.
results.b-a: You possess the flame of Envisage: an elegant and ethereal one that gleams through the murk. By clearly elucidating equivocal matters, the fire enables you to discern with higher acuity and create a systematic schema, eventually enlightening the pathway to wisdom. You are a person who decides and operates based on a logical ground, analytically understanding the world as if it were a puzzle. This makes you a strong competitor in various fields of interest, mainly where strategy and foreplanning matters most. This gift of yours could be used for many things, yet it is most likely that your goals in life are in conformity with societal standards; whether it is about relationships or career, the ideal for which you strive would be what many others also consider to be desirable and admirable to accomplish. Moreover, since your motives and ideals are commonly relatable, you easily acquire friends and colleagues who share your ambition and thereby ensure the legitimacy of your vision. All in all, you are a bright one who is skilled in strategizing, planning and executing the most reasonable means to achieve a commonly desired end. Although it is true that your purpose is respected by the populace and even offers you a sense of comfort, it does not however, guarantee you a truly valuable journey in your personal life. Especially at this modern age of overflowing chaos and insanity, it is easy to confuse what is popular with what is good; thus, developing the ability to independently think is all the more crucial. HEARTH is here to help: with Helm, grow your introspective ability and integrate all the deep parts of yourself, and aim for a truly meaningful life that only you know how to live.
results.b-c: You possess the flame of Envisage: an elegant and ethereal one that gleams through the murk. By clearly elucidating equivocal matters, the fire enables you to discern with higher acuity and create a systematic schema, eventually enlightening the pathway to wisdom. With a systemic and logical value structure, you fastidiously assess the essence of matters, intending to organize and make sense of the chaotic. Whether it is about a person or a thing, you are the first to notice the weak areas that need change or improvement; with a sense of austerity, you analyze the flaws and the reason it occurred, offering solutions on how it can be effectively revised. Since this ability allows you to thoroughly inspect and perceive the world with heightened acuity, you are also able to propose new visions for how the world should be. In short, you are a person with a very specific point of view, constantly evaluating and classifying your subjects instead of simply going with your gut feeling. Like an alchemy for gold, you endeavour to exact a strategy or formula to surpass the imperfection of yourself and the world. However, you must understand that these traits of yours indicate high neuroticism and stress; some might even feel uncomfortable for you being hypercritical and perfectionistic. HEARTH is here to help: with Attune, feel more comfortable with yourself by accepting things as they are, be flexible in implementing your visions, and move in a direction that is not only right and just, but also yours to reap the benefits.
results.b-d: You possess the flame of Envisage: an elegant and ethereal one that gleams through the murk. By clearly elucidating equivocal matters, the fire enables you to discern with higher acuity and create a systematic schema, eventually enlightening the pathway to wisdom. Being a strictly rational thinker, you make informed decisions from a realistic perspective, assessing both your resources and constraints, as well as the associated risks and rewards. Rather than being a hopeless romantic and aiming for the highest ideal, you decisively do what is best for you within realistic expectations. Also, since you are neither an optimist or a pessimist, you won’t engage in much imaginative joy or pain that one might experience from appreciating poetry, cinema or music; metaphysics such as ethics and aesthetics are too speculative in your opinion, factual concepts such as science or finance would be what grasp your sole interest. All in all, you are a down-to-earth strategist who stays calm and collected without causing needless commotion and extravagance; you do what you can do for the time being, thinking less of ‘what you could’ve done’ or ‘how it could’ve been’. Even in dire situations where others tend to be extremely emotional, you are able to strategize a salvage plan, seldom yielding to unreasonable melancholy or angst. However, as your way of living is like riding on a high speed train, you might end up missing out on the opportunities to notice and explore your hidden paths and possibilities. HEARTH is here to help: with Reverie, learn how to see the subtle beauty that is around us, be increasingly original, and live your life to its fullest potential.
results.b-e: You possess the flame of Envisage: an elegant and ethereal one that gleams through the murk. By clearly elucidating equivocal matters, the fire enables you to discern with higher acuity and create a systematic schema, eventually enlightening the pathway to wisdom. As a person who is careful and punctilious, you are skilled at examining phenomenas, analyzing problems, and revising strategies and plans. You catch onto the details which others might easily overlook, and this astuteness renders your thought processes more accurate and systemic. Perhaps you would have experienced your predictions about the future being more than often correct; this is ascribable to the thoroughness of your estimations, or more fundamentally, your general personality to be cautious. In short, you are a cerebral person who thinks before talking or acting, and one who can see farther into the future. However, this could also indicate your perfectionistic trait: you might often find yourself not taking the first step at all due to excessive concerns or worrying about possible failures. This may hinder the process of active learning from trial and failure, which in turn poses a risk of being captured in a placid life where you lose control over yourself. HEARTH is here to help: with Transcend, amplify your drive and passion, build self-efficacy and take full control of your life via self-directed activities.
results.b-f: You possess the flame of Envisage: an elegant and ethereal one that gleams through the murk. By clearly elucidating equivocal matters, the fire enables you to discern with higher acuity and create a systematic schema, eventually enlightening the pathway to wisdom. As an independent thinker who penetrates through the naïve, you are a lover of wisdom and truth, with a highly developed ability to think critically and judge. You disassociate yourself from the biases of your society and culture to acquire impartial objectivity; and in the process of doing so, you would have spent much time by yourself, cultivating insights via books or travels. Furthermore, as you value truth and honesty, you would act and speak straightforwardly without circumlocution or making excuses for yourself. In short, you are an astute thinker who attempts to liberate oneself from the shackles of the herd mentality. Like the fable ‘The Ants and The Grasshopper’, you guide your life with a certain kind of purpose and severeness, while being unsympathetic towards the ones who haven't stored anything away for the winter. However, others may perceive your sense of purity as overly callous and unforgiving; although you might dismiss this concern, it would still cost you dearly since social relationships and reputations do matter greatly in all aspects of life. HEARTH is here to help: with Harmonize, cultivate your sensibility, learn how to act cogently, and ultimately aim to be a person who can resonate with different kinds of people while retaining the purity of mind.
results.c-a: You possess the flame of Attune: a transformative wave that ebbs and flows with poise. Providing you with a sense of realistic acceptance, it acclimatizes you for your best interest and holds you in perfect balance in spite of the ever-changing world. As an easygoing person with variable interests, you adapt to new environments with ease, flexibly rearranging yourself to match any given atmosphere. Also, as you share the same passion and sentiment with many others, you clearly know what is appropriate and what is not, regarding everything from your sense of morality to what you call success. This allows you to conduct yourself in a sensible and witty way without overstepping boundaries; many would enjoy acquainting you due to your relaxed and relatable nature. Overall, you don’t confine yourself to a specific character, acting in a way that is most apt depending on each situation. Although this prompt responsiveness ensures you to be compatible even in tricky situations infused with discrete nuances, your lack of resoluteness poses a risk of being spineless, if not bring about an existential crisis of not knowing who you truly are. HEARTH is here to help: with Helm, understand your innate and unique wills, deepen the connection with yourself, and set a fulfilling life that is both self-actualizing and enjoyable.
results.c-b: You possess the flame of Attune: a transformative wave that ebbs and flows with poise. Providing you with a sense of realistic acceptance, it acclimatizes you for your best interest and holds you in perfect balance in spite of the ever-changing world. As a lively person infused with optimistic energy, you enjoy living in the present rather than worrying about the future or dwelling in the past. With an air of nonchalance, you casually move past life’s obstacles; you know by experience that even the most daunting situations usually turn out to be just fine, if not a blessing in disguise. In other words, like a skilled surfer at the sea, you sensuously listen to the moving tides and changing currents, simply letting yourself go and become one with the flow. In short, you are a person who is always ready to utilize whatever it is that you have in hand. You let the situation be as it is, and without any significant exertion, you smoothly slide through. However, as much as this Carpe Diem outlook allows you to savor simple moments and find little joys in your everyday life, it might render you completely passive and send you into hedonistic mindlessness. HEARTH is here to help: with Envisage, contemplate on the core and essence of matters, give order to your thoughts, and get hold of a lifestyle that is not only comfortable, but also meaningful.
results.c-d: You possess the flame of Attune: a transformative wave that ebbs and flows with poise. Providing you with a sense of realistic acceptance, it acclimatizes you for your best interest and holds you in perfect balance in spite of the ever-changing world. You encounter the world with open arms, allowing yourself to embrace and adapt to the world rather than resist and rebel against it. From a pragmatic perspective, you accept situations as they are instead of digging up problems, especially in cases where poking around is not in your best interest. Similarly, regarding yourself and the world, you do not bother fantasizing ‘What if?’; you would argue that brooding over such imaginations only causes one to blame, regret, or fall into despair. This rational practicality of yours is what lets you stay in the light: happy and unbothered, even-tempered and laid-back, understood by most and questioned by a few. In short, you are a down-to-earth person of practical sensibility who interprets and reacts to situations in a way that is simple yet effective. Although this convenient, utilitarian way of life provides you with positive mentality and a sense of belonging, it restricts you from thinking outside the box and discovering novel solutions. Thus it would be wise to question your ‘common sense’ from time to time, and also remember that almost all popular beliefs proved themselves to be utterly and completely wrong in the test of time. HEARTH is here to help: via Reverie, nurture your sense of pure curiosity, shape your unique character, and lead a life where you creatively adapt to the ever-changing world.
results.c-e: You possess the flame of Attune: a transformative wave that ebbs and flows with poise. Providing you with a sense of realistic acceptance, it acclimatizes you for your best interest and holds you in perfect balance in spite of the ever-changing world. As a quick-witted person who solves everyday problems in a clever and non-obvious way, you effectively manage tasks in a way that saves time or reduces stress. Without pushing your agenda, you brilliantly adjust and flow with ease, while just letting things be as they are. Chances are you usually don’t see any reason to take a hard stand against something you don’t really know, apart from situations where the consequences would directly affect you. This nonchalance allows you to be observant and patient; although you won’t bother to share this reverie, you might have wondered why some are trying too hard, when they can achieve their desired goals with much less endeavor. All in all, your greatest strength is your adaptability; without pushing your ideals headstrong, you align your values with that of the world, moving ahead of the game by skipping unnecessary conflicts. However, on the flip side of the coin, you might be bereft of industriousness and robustness, and thus, hit the wall when you are faced with an arduous and laborious task where no shortcut is to be found. HEARTH is here to help: with Transcend, ignite your hidden passion, build up resilience to withstand pressure, and lead a flexible life that glimpses on surpassing its limits.
results.c-f: You possess the flame of Attune: a transformative wave that ebbs and flows with poise. Providing you with a sense of realistic acceptance, it acclimatizes you for your best interest and holds you in perfect balance in spite of the ever-changing world. As a calm and unbothered person with solid emotional stability, you cope with stress and challenging situations using your own resources and abilities. Due to this sense of self-sufficiency, you rarely reach out for external help or support; you trust your own judgment and instincts, preferring to follow through independently rather than relying on others' advice for validation. Furthermore, although you don’t mind helping others and giving out words of encouragement, you avoid getting too nosy or proactively helping others, as you believe everyone has their own way of living. This phlegmatic optimism allows you to stay consistent in whatever you do or whoever you meet, which in turn gains you a reputation of genuine trustworthiness. To sum up, you are a well-balanced person with an understanding attitude towards life’s inevitable ups and downs. You believe in the ability to deal with your own hardship, just as you believe in others' ability to manage theirs. However, your individualistic attitude might cause you miss out the opportunity to synergize. That is, together, you might create something wonderful that neither you nor the other would have been able to achieve alone. HEARTH is here to help: with Harmonize, grow your empathetic connection, increase your ability to discuss and debate, and let the spark and chemistry brighten up your life with energy and warmth.
results.d-a: You possess the flame of Reverie: a playful and artistic one that sparks with pure curiosity. By illuminating unexplored realms, the fire grants you the artistic sense to unveil new possibilities and bring them to life in your own unique ways. More than often you would find yourself fascinated and stimulated by random objects or events, which you then explore in an enthusiastic manner. As you possess a lively personality, you view life as a mysterious adventure rather than a serious objective that has to be accomplished; this allows you to be highly open and expressive, accepting new ideas while also being able to illustrate your own. Through this ongoing process of absorbing and originating ideas, you will experience a colorful life: one that is active, bold and adventurous. All in all, the fire within you is one that dances playfully, opening new doors and inviting you into mind-blowing experiences. On the verge between the known and the unknown is where you thrive most, for the uncertainty of what awaits excites you and encourages you to exceed your limitations. However, you must be aware of the chaos it could bring into your life; as you have access to possibilities, chaos also has access to you. Thus, building a firm core of belief is much needed to withstand the occasional outburst of chaos that is inside you, one which is forged only through rigorous introspection and stern contemplation of your inner world. HEARTH is here to help: with Helm, explore and recognize your personal ideals and shortcomings, build a stable structure through connecting to your unseen parts, and finally, awaken your hidden potential.

results.e-a: You possess the flame of Transcend: a brave and heroic one that is set ablaze with passion and dignity. It symbolizes your diligence and devotion that enables you to steadily continue with your endeavor. You rigorously strive to attain a status of admiration and to establish yourself as a prominent member of the society. Since your strong motivation is congruous with the societal model of success, you are not easily bothered by needless doubts and proceed with great efficiency. Furthermore, your natural respect for and alignment with shared values make you an excellent team player; since you understand the importance of the common objective wholeheartedly, you take on the responsibility of the team as your own. Thus, it is likely that other people notice and speak highly of your sturdiness and resilience, which transpire through your behavior and attitude. To sum up, the fire inside you is your conscientious nature and its flaming drive for prestigious success. Although this fortitude of yours will help fulfill your aspirations, from time to time, you may feel a disturbance in your mind about whether the target you are aiming at is actually yours to speak. If you are not mindful and cautious about this matter, it may lead to untimely burnouts or psychological distress; thus, it is recommended that you examine more on your individuality and gain a sense of internal motivation.
